subScenes.name: 初次见面
subScenes.description: 教授问候并开启论文反馈谈话

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, thanks for coming in. How's everything going with your paper?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，谢谢你来。论文进展怎么样？

responses.text: I'm doing okay, but I'm a bit stuck on the methodology section.
responses.text_cn: 还行，但方法部分有点卡住了。

responses.text: Honestly, it's been challenging, but I'm eager to improve.
responses.text_cn: 说实话有点难，但我很想改进。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体问题回应，展示主动性

subScenes.name: 接收反馈
subScenes.description: 教授指出论文主要问题并给出建议

qaPairs.speakerText: Your argument's strong, but you're missing citations for three key claims. You can't just state things like that.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的论点不错，但三个关键主张都没引用。不能这么直接下结论。

responses.text: You're right—I didn't realize how thin the support was. I'll add sources right away.
responses.text_cn: 您说得对，我没意识到支持太弱，马上补上。

responses.text: Oh wow, I didn't think that was a big deal. Thanks for pointing it out!
responses.text_cn: 啊原来这么严重？谢谢提醒！

qaPairs.usageNote: 先承认问题，再表达行动意愿

subScenes.name: 协商截止日
subScenes.description: 学生请求延期并提出修改计划

qaPairs.speakerText: I can give you an extra week, but you need to show me a revision plan by Thursday.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我可以多给你一周，但周四前得交修改计划。

responses.text: That works! I'll draft a timeline with specific edits and send it by Thursday afternoon.
responses.text_cn: 没问题！我会列个修改时间表，周四下午发您。

responses.text: Really? Thank you so much! I'll get it done.
responses.text_cn: 真的吗？太感谢了！我一定完成。

qaPairs.usageNote: 提出具体执行方案，提高请求成功率

subScenes.name: 确认任务
subScenes.description: 双方确认下一步行动和交付物

qaPairs.speakerText: So to confirm: you'll revise the literature review, add 8 new citations, and submit the draft by next Friday?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 确认一下：你要修改文献综述、加8个新引用，下周五交初稿，对吗？

responses.text: Yes, that's correct—I'll also include a changes log so you can track what I updated.
responses.text_cn: 对，我还会附上修改日志，方便您跟踪。

responses.text: Yep, got it. I'll make sure to hit all those points.
responses.text_cn: 明白，我会确保做到这些。

qaPairs.usageNote: 复述关键点，避免理解偏差

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, I'm glad we're on the same page. Keep me posted on your progress.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 很好，我们想法一致了，进展记得告诉我。

responses.text: Thank you so much for your time and guidance—I really appreciate it.
responses.text_cn: 非常感谢您的时间和指导，我真的很感激。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用感谢收尾，体现专业素养
